_header: Who that lust for to look
_description: A Book Plate incorporating the name of Lady Scrope and a request for prayers — four couplets

CamClare5.Transcription:
Ho that lust for to lokeor for to rede on this bokeBe he of cyte
                    toun or thropePray he for my lady scropeAnd thinke ȝe neuir to
                    done amysBut þenke on hym that gaf ȝow thisffor ihesu loue
                    haue hym in myndethat this sette on ȝowre boke be hynde

         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 564.
